law.catch_line: A contractual employee is a temporary employee whose employment is governed by Title 13 of this arti...

section.section: A contractual employee is a temporary employee whose employment is governed by Title 13 of this article.
An emergency employee is a temporary employee who is appointed under § 7-301 of this article.

text.section:
A temporary employee:
is not included in the skilled service, professional service, management service, or executive service; and
is not a special appointment described in § 6-405 of this subtitle.
